name: DarkGirl Repacks [Wide]
description: Dark theme for FitGirl Repack + wide view (Fill Page)

user.name: Explisam
user.about: I have been doing this for long for my own use but i thought i'd share it. You can email me theme requests at explisam@gmail.com for any site you wish.
